name: Johnnie Walker Black Label
details: A blended Scotch whisky with smoky and sweet flavors.

name: Jack Daniel's Old No. 7
details: A Tennessee whiskey with notes of caramel, vanilla, and oak.

name: Jameson Irish Whiskey
details: A smooth Irish whiskey with hints of vanilla, nuts, and spices.

name: Absolut Vodka
details: A clean and smooth vodka with subtle hints of grain and fruit.

name: Grey Goose
details: A premium vodka known for its crisp and smooth taste.

name: Tito's Handmade Vodka
details: An American vodka distilled from corn, with a slightly sweet finish.

name: Hendrick's Gin
details: A unique gin with infusions of cucumber and rose petals.

name: Tanqueray London Dry Gin
details: A classic London dry gin with a balance of juniper and botanicals.

name: Bombay Sapphire
details: A premium gin with a blend of 10 botanicals for a smooth, aromatic flavor.

name: Patrón Silver
details: A smooth silver tequila with light citrus and pepper flavors.

name: Casamigos Reposado
details: A reposado tequila with notes of caramel, vanilla, and oak.

name: Don Julio 1942
details: A luxury tequila with rich caramel and vanilla flavors.

name: Bacardi Superior
details: A white rum with subtle vanilla and almond flavors.

name: Captain Morgan Spiced Rum
details: A spiced rum with hints of vanilla, cinnamon, and clove.

name: Hennessy VS
details: A classic cognac with notes of toasted almond and fresh grapes.
